website_summaries.verdict: It has similar features as some costlier models; but the size and durability may be questionable for some users.
pros: An affordable car cover and storage bag with 3-layer construction
Fits sedans up to 210 inches long
Lightweight – easy to put on and secure with included grommets
cons: Customer complaints that it doesn't repel water very well, and tears easily
Only 3 available sizes that don't fit all vehicles as expected

customer_reviews.title: waste of $$$ not for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: it says indood outdoor, water repellent, water proof... it has been only 2 days and few hours of rain, car is completely wet!!! waste of money????
customer_reviews.author: hemant

customer_reviews.title: Fits my large car great!
customer_reviews.text: I only need a cover for my car so the town doesn't complain it's not currently registered. This cover fit great on my overly large classic Euro model Mercedes. It didn't note front and back, so I don't know if it matters, but it had elastic at the ends so it hugs under the bumpers. It also comes with a cored to the under the chassis to keep the cover from getting caught in the wind. For the price, if I need another one after winter I won't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: They are the best covers we've had
customer_reviews.text: This fits the 2017 Camry XLE and the 2015 Camry SE despite what the specs say. These covers hold up in the Florida rain and heat year after year. We buy a new one every 3 years when we lease a new car. They are the best covers we've had.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worse purchase I have made thus far!! I bought it to protect my car from the awful staining that happens when the tree above my assisgned parking spot drops leaves and berries onto my car. Placed it on my car after I had the previous stains buffed out and the car washed. I wake up and uncover the car and THIS IS WHAT I GET!! Worse than not having the car covered at all 😡
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for my Intermediate Size Classic 1967 Fairlane GT
customer_reviews.text: Joke for a Full Size Car Cover - fully deployed on my Classic 67 Fairlane GT (Intermediate Car) it is stretched to the MAX Front to Rear & Only covers 2/3 of the way down sides of my NOT Full Size Classic car ~ so it could fly away here in a Fla storm without tethering in some concrete roped block engineering. Not Happy Camper !!!
customer_reviews.author: Madshirt

customer_reviews.title: really happy I got this
customer_reviews.text: so far so good I'm working on a honda project car and wanted to keep the brand new headlights from turning orange until it is ready and it needs a paint job so it is an eye sore :) need to get those things to tie it down more but it fits my honda accord 4 door sedan just like a fitted bed sheet around the trunk and headlight area. this is light weight and kind of like a tarp tent type of material but way way better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: this would be great if the car has to sit out in the elements or will sit for a long time and not be used. I park my car in a public garage in NYC and am just trying to keep the dust and dirt off that floats in. I was looking for something light weight and easy to use. This is very heavy and hardcore. I'll be returning it, but only because it wasn't what i had in mind. I think it would be a great car cover for a car that will sit for long periods of time. Its heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: ... it for an 06 Altima and the fit is perfect really easy to cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for an 06 Altima and the fit is perfect really easy to cover. My main reason for purchasing it was to keep the car clean as dust just seems to be a magnet to the car always getting attracted to it and it does a great job of keeping dust off and keeping the car looking like it just got washed, really happy with that. The only thing that it does not protect against is water which is stated in the description and pictures, that is the only issue i have with it but again i bought it to keep dust off which it does and for the price it more than exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Rent-A-Swagg

customer_reviews.title: 2009 Infiniti G37S Sedan (largest cover size works fine)
customer_reviews.text: Got a cover for garage storage only, to protect from dust build up. It's a generic fit, doesn't allow for the dual side mirrors, so the cover sides are raised about 4-5 inches from bottom of the front doors/baseboard. It serves the purpose that I wanted at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisabeth Beard

customer_reviews.title: NOT pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to be of decent quality when I first received it, but alas, it didn't even make it through 6 months in the sun without falling apart. Mind you, there was no wind, no rain - just sunshine. It literally fell apart starting at the roof, all the way down to the front and back. I came outside one day and it was laying on the ground in pieces all around my car. For $2 more, I could have bought the one I usually get at Walmart. Those last over a year without breaking down. Learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Trace B

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for months now and I'm not gonna lie, I wish I would have bought a better one. It fits my 2004 Impala LS perfectly fine, except it holds water underneath the car because of the elastic parts on the cover. So, water is sitting on the bottom lip of your car. And not just a little bit, it POURS out when you lift it up.
customer_reviews.author: Cloe

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep pollen off car
customer_reviews.text: I went in knowing the heavy rain in Florida would seep through (and it did) so I have no issues with that. I bought it to keep the pollen from the trees off my car and it does just that! It’s very lightweight and easy to put on. Make sure you google the length of your car and then choose the correct size. Mine fit my 2017 Maxima perfect, I think it was the 197 length. I don’t have to use the straps because the fitted ends hold on tight enough! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kalee Carroll

customer_reviews.title: good cover, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: good for the price, fits my Mercedes C240 as I needed it outside my garage for a few months. After I brought my car back inside the garage I use it as a cover for a pile of furniture I have in the garage. Very thin fabric and it will tear if it snags a edge, but then again I'm not using it as it's intended purpose. But as a car cover it worked fine. Not sure how long it would last in a hot, baking Ca Sun however.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES KERRY

customer_reviews.title: Economical price, not economical quality!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2018 jag xf because we have large trees that drop pollen/sap. Very hard to get off even with a good wax. Just google your vehicle’s overall length to make sure you get the right size. If it’s in between sizes, get the larger one. The elastic can be tucked far under the bumpers to keep it tight.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good product...Bad fit
customer_reviews.text: The size estimate for purchase was WAY off! Wanted a cover for my 1977 Mustang and the original ad claimed that only the large size would fit...totally inaccurate. next size down would have been better, maybe even the smallest size. As it turns out, the car is kept in a garage, so the product is adequate for current needs. BUT buyers should beware and go by actual car measurements rather than the Classic/Amazon recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kenneth Adlam

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: ...rain seeps right through it. Car is SOAKED! Why would I spend $31 on a car covering that isn't weatherproof? Waste of money... do not buy if you want your vehicle protected from the rain!
customer_reviews.author: StephLadder

customer_reviews.title: Car cover is not water repellent/resistant/proof, or whatever you want to call it.
customer_reviews.text: Product described as water-repellent, definitely not. I bought this for my classic car that has a leaking window seal and this was the temporary fix for it, but it is pretty much useless since it leaks through the cover, through the window seal and into my car. I also searched car covers specifically for my car, and chose this one, but it is WAY to big. Make sure you store your car indoors if you want to use this cover, plus dont trust the car fitment guide.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Overated....
customer_reviews.text: On a positive note, it wasn't too expensive and it may be good for temporary use. It lasted me for less than one year under the Florida sun. I put it to use late August of 2017 and it began to crumble and rip within the first six months. If you intend to use this for less extreme weather it is still very fragile. It's basically reinforced paper. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Blockhead

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's good quality. Bought just to keep the dust off car while it's stored in the barn. Very happy with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT provide protection against dirt
customer_reviews.text: This was for my deceased fathers car ( of which was my grandfather's prior to that). I had just had a spendy detail job on it before parking under a carport and covering with this product. It was spotless. I wanted it protected until I'm ready to list it for sale. I'm moving so need to move car as well. So I just removed cover for first time and the car is filthy. Why is this important? Well, while the car is 30 yrs old.... its a classic Cadillac and only has 70,000 miles on it. I'm pissed as this manufacturer states the cover protects from dirt !!
customer_reviews.author: PDX C.G.

customer_reviews.title: What you buy is not what you get!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to see this product arrive on my door step, it was vacuum sealed in clean perfectly intact box. I thought “finally! My Torino will be shielded from the elements” this thing was huge and upon stretching this cover out I immediately notice the large rips on both end where the cover meets the side mirrors! Damnit what a disappointment, it just started raining and I need to return it but my car needs to be covered at the same time. Had to buy a tarp and returning this
customer_reviews.author: WTF-OMG

customer_reviews.title: Custom like fit for 2003 BMW 745i
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2003 BMW 745i like an expensive custom cover. Easy on / off, and no scratch points. Two eye grommets for additional tie down if needed. I will re-rate next year after regular use, but honestly @ the price point it's already exceeded my expectations in fit alone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Flint

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Like with most car covers if vehicle is outside the wind will move it and scratch the paint. These surface scratches will buff right out easily with a microfiber towel and a spray detailed wax.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Used on the car while I was out of town for a couple of days. Definitely protected it from Tree sap and bird poop, but it rained at some point and the ink in the cover bled onto the car. It washed off fine, but not really something I was happy about dealing with. You get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Super value! Bought it for my Mustang Convertible. Website didn't specifically state it would be the right one but I took a chance that it would. It's a bit too long but doesn't create a problem. Rather than cut a hole for the antenna, I just unscrewed it and placed it inside the car. I'm using it inside my shop where the car is stored for the winter and will not have exposure to wind, rain or snow. The price is right! Good, quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: PNW Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Affordable car cover
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cover a classic car in my garage and it is of good quality for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: James Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Just investigate all the facts of all that icription and the durability of the material.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work they way I needed it to. On the 2nd day ,I was putting the cover on my car and it got ripped on my mirror. I have a car that is 1 year old and there te no sharp points on the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: For inside garage use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my car parked in my garage. It gets pretty dusty so this cover was perfect. And the price was right
customer_reviews.author: CON

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my Nissan Altima as I was going to be out of town for over 2 months. It stayed on and did not get tattered from any storm damage!! It protected the care as I hoped! I also got the lock strap cover protector. It worked great too!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Negri

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price - short term outside
customer_reviews.text: Although this might not be sturdy enough for long term outdoors its great as an in-garage car dust cover. Outside short term a few months it might be ok too
customer_reviews.author: R~

customer_reviews.title: Decent car cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it worked pretty well. I had a tree that was dripping sap and this blocked most of the sap from getting on my car. It definitely isn't big enough for my 2004 Lexus LS. The sides doesn't cover all the way down. But all I cared about was the top anyways.
customer_reviews.author: M.A Veth

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the cover. I park under a pine tree and was tired of having sap all over my car. Stays in place for the most part. Only came partly off one day during a really bad wind storm, but for normal use/wind doesn't come off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tea

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year and a half in Florida
customer_reviews.text: Cover worked great at first. It did last 1 1/2 years so I guess $29 for that long is good. I'm in Florida and this was on a car outside for that long. Will try a different one next. Didn't feel like paying $150 for a great quality cover, even though they last years. If you want a cover that will last almost 1.5 years, this will work. After that long the material falls apart and tears super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gullion

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT A @)!& CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago and i just put it on today 1.28.19. it doesnt even come close to fitting a 2017 Dodge Charger. Very disappointed in my purchase. I needed to put it on for tonight's windy cold conditions and it just doesnt come close to fitting my charger
customer_reviews.author: Texas Storm Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Thin but good to keep from being damaged ... Get better if have expensive car....
customer_reviews.author: j johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good basic protection for my 1959 AMC
customer_reviews.text: Good cover for the price; comes with an antenna hole patch, carry case, and rope for going under the car. There is only one eyelet on each side, but it's centered. The fabric looks wrinkled, even after three months on the car, but for basic protection it's perfect. And, it fits a 1959 AMC Rambler perfectly. Just in case you have one of those.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Covers quite well
customer_reviews.text: Really nice ! The material is thicker than I thought it’d be. The elastic holds it on quite well. Well worth the $. A definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only time will tell. It fits well and stays on even in heavy winds...
customer_reviews.author: mamba out

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 86 Monte Carlo
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my baby needed, came packaged very well, maybe a little too well, 3 boxes and vacuum sealed, but thanks love it
customer_reviews.author: Goins

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my SO’s 1993 Mustang Convertible. Fits perfectly and is holding up in the Missouri winter weather. The car is a daily driver so the cover comes off and on frequently and has held up under snowfall and freezing temps. He’s very happy with this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to keep water out. It didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover to protect a car that has a leaking sunroof. I had taken it off the road to save it for my son. I cleaned the car inside and out before covering it. When I checked on the car months later it had standing water inside of it, and it’s interior now looks like a science experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not too good for outside use
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, but make sure it is really tight down tight or a bit of wind will beat it up pretty badly.
customer_reviews.author: mt1967

customer_reviews.title: Great Protector
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product. I live in MN and I have a car outside. This has held up well in the winter with cold and snow, and through the Spring with rain and thunderstorms. It protected my car very well! Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kuks

customer_reviews.title: Does everything a great cover should do!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is worth every penny! It's easy to put on and take off, is of durable construction, keeps my car clean (we have cats), and is very affordable. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: cinderelly007

customer_reviews.title: Cover did not protect water from going inside Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to protect the Camry from water going inside when it rains. It was disappointing to find out the water got in anyway. We need something until we can get it looked at to see why the water is coming in. So it was very disappointing to find out that it was coming in. So I am returning the product to search for something else that hopefully works.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bj

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PUT THE CATS OUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits our 2011 Mercedes E350 very well. It is used indoors to keep the cats off the paint. It doesn't cover the very bottoms of the doors, but cats don't get on the bottoms anyway. The elastic feature is nice and provides a nice firm fit. It's lightweight and easy to fold for reuse. However, we haven't tried putting it back in the bag. We just fold it and put it on the chair. Well worth the money for cat protection.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Gratia

customer_reviews.title: I mainly use this cover to keep my car from ...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this cover to keep my car from sun damage, as I live in the desert.. the elastic keeps it from coming, off very well. I bought a bit bigger size for my small car. I tie the sides down with gallon milk jugs filled with water, on the ground, and that keeps the sides from blowing off. So far it is working very well! We have a lot of wind here.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: 87 grand prix 2 door coupe sport Le perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: Water was getting in my trunk from rain. With the cover water was still able to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage!
customer_reviews.text: For purposes of size only ...this is a 1999 Buick park avenue...! 4 stars only bc we haven't had it long...
customer_reviews.author: B. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: My car looks like it's wearing "floods"
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 2017 Dodge Charger for keeping dust off in garage over the winter. Description led me to believe it should have been plenty large enough, but it's too short on the sides. My car looks like it's wearing "floods".
customer_reviews.author: K. Tewkesbury

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Only thing the cover was really big for my car 1998 Mustang v6
customer_reviews.author: Ebonique N Brooks

customer_reviews.title: The cover is over sized to make sure it fits
customer_reviews.text: Cover is huge.It fits the car and then some.It keeps the car safe from the weather.It is a bit hard to roll up and store since it's over sized but having more fabric than needed helps to ensure the car is covered all the way.You may need help covering your car since it is so big.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE L. WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: so its nice to know my car is parked at home safe ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a garage so I considered buying this product for a bit before making the purchase. The material is not so heavy that I can't pick it up on my own, and it covers and fits my car perfectly. I go out of town a lot and take a company car, so its nice to know my car is parked at home safe from rain, hail, and potential scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Dust cover only. Its cheap so its okay.
customer_reviews.text: Dust cover only. Its cheap so its okay. update 8-2018, i used this as an outdoor cover. This lasted 2 years as an outdoor car cover, it is disintegrating and turning to powder, when removed it leaves a blue powder that has to be hosed off, it lastede 2years and cost under 30.00 im ok with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kenpo saber

customer_reviews.title: Works great, wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to cover my convertible but even though it said it would fit it is way to bit and blows off easily have to rig it to get it to stay in place. Seems to be a much better fit for a full size car or small suv.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and priced perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these... the first one melted a hole in it when I let it touch my tail pipes (my stupid fault); the price is amazing for what you get. I keep my Corvette in the garage and I just want this to protect it from my wife (haha); and it does. Also the dust!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan E. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Gotch ya covered.
customer_reviews.text: This car cover comes vacuum packaged, making it very small. However, when unfolded, I found that it was large enough to fit my car with some room to spare. The material seems thick enough to last maybe 3 to 4 years in the sun and weather. It was needed to protect my car. I like it very much and do recommend it for all who need a well made car cover. Thanks for the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Databoss

customer_reviews.title: OKAY for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain for the price- but I will anyway- the plastic grommet used to secure this cover popped from the cover the first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond F Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Holds up
customer_reviews.text: Put it over our 2016 Buick Lacrosse, fit well and stood up to some real howling winds and sun here in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: yme

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit Volvo S60 2012
customer_reviews.text: Although, it looks like it's covering the whole car. It doesn't. I have a stretch rubber cord holding it tight. It covers front and back perfectly with extra room but the sides are exposed. I just need this cover to minimized the spring pollen in South Carolina.
customer_reviews.author: Burt C

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done
customer_reviews.text: It's doing its job. I was afraid to purcase a more expensive one in case someone steals it. I was worried that maybe because it is inexpensive, it would not stay on. Yet, it works great
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Cover Not Soft Inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to cover new black car in garage to protect from dust and family members walking by car with backpacks, purses, etc. I am concerned because the cover is not soft inside. It's hard which makes me wonder if this will scratch my paint especially if my car has a little dust. I took it off and now not using it. I read reviews and no one addresses if this is not good or is good for cars with shiny, black new cars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this cover to help keep my car cleaner ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover to help keep my car cleaner and cooler during the summer months. Looking back at the advertised information, there is nothing stated as to what this cover is supposed to do. The material is partially translucent, i.e., you can see through it, a little bit. My car seemed even hotter than using my window sun blocker. So... how is it supposed to benefit anything? They state "superior protection against dirt and harmful UV rays." Didn't convince me. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: traveltime

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The cover for our 1967 Mustang blew away in a recent storm. These is a leak in the molding so it's important that we keep it covered or the inside gets soaked when it rains. This product arrived extremely quick! It attaches much more securely than our previous cover. It's staying on and keeping the inside of my husband's project clean and dry!
customer_reviews.author: KTorres

customer_reviews.title: Won’t even last a year. But you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Won’t even last a year and isn’t water resistant. The wind tends to blow it off pretty easily, so make sure you strap it on.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Works good enough for my Chevy full size sedan
customer_reviews.text: Works good enough for my Chevy full size sedan. Stayed on the car in the last 2 windy storms. Very easy to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Deyan Geo

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP  CHEAP CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Mine tore like a paper towel. I live in Southern California was on travel and noticed some tears near the sun roof as I arrived home. I proceeded to remove it to investigate the tears and with no special force in removing it, it tore another 6 feet like a paper towel! I am not exaggerating. According to Amazon, it is too late to return even though it has been maybe 3 months since I received it. Pretty shabby treatment of a good customer!
customer_reviews.author: randall t clark

customer_reviews.title: It is a thin piece of plastic-like fabric and the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a thin piece of plastic-like fabric and the tie downs are grommets in the sides with pieces of rope that are too small to reach from one side of the car to the other and would require you to get on the ground and crawl around to get them under the car and then loop them through the grommet on the other side to maybe tie a knot to keep it in place. The instructions included also say not to use on a wet car or in wet conditions meaning that we cannot put the cover on the car to protect it from snow - the reason we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: cricket

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on my 1969 Camaro. Snug with no sag. Quality thickness. Perfect for indoor storage.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap cover
customer_reviews.text: I need it cheap cover for my nova. I keep it inside in the garage just to "protect" from the dust. Ordered 2 by mistake but I like it so much I will keep the second one.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure the med would have been fine. Not impressed with the fit or quality but ...
customer_reviews.text: The product info said the Med. size (up to 191") would not fit? only the Large which I ordered for my corvette, 174". Its way to big, I'm sure the med would have been fine. Not impressed with the fit or quality but then again it was inexpensive. When I went on their web site today they showed no covers available for my car??
customer_reviews.author: Bob B. Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not "water repellent."
customer_reviews.text: I bought the full-size car cover to cover my 1986 Chevrolet Camaro Z28. The Camaro is 16' long, exactly, and the car cover fits perfectly. Unfortunately the cover does nothing to keep dust or moisture off the car, and any amount of wind will easily blow the cover off.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Rarely used cover. It started to rip today. I would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ericthepaintballguy

customer_reviews.title: great fit item as advertised would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover for what it is at an excellent price. It’s a dust resistant and enviornment resistant cover as advertised and fits well not waterproof, knew it would not be only wanted to protect from sun damage, was aware water would penatrate cover. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but be warned
customer_reviews.text: Great for sun protection. Does not do well against water or wind though, overall not a bad cover, but wouldnt use if you're worried about swirls and dirt
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Powell

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my old man's 79 TransAm special edition - fits perfectly. I'll update once the Las Vegas sun has had some time to cook the thing and let you all know how long this'll last you.
customer_reviews.author: JD Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Not great for protecting your car from the elements at all. Might be good at keeping dust off. But not for any type of outdoor weather. Any type of water gets through. I would only suggest as a cover for your car if your car is kept indoors.
customer_reviews.author: MadKrn

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.text: This car cover was great for my needs. I have a very long, extra wide kit car in the backyard and it required an abnormally large car cover. This product did the trick and it's been holding up against the elements for many months now. It looks decent, no rips or tears. It also hangs on pretty good, I've only had it slip off a couple times when it was extremely windy outside.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson.C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: I have 1970 mercury cougar and it fits great. I would have given it 5 stars but after a couple rains outside it left a dust residue on the car. So not completely weather proof.
customer_reviews.author: Super dad

customer_reviews.title: Piece of rubbish and cost around $2 to make FYI
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my car even close and no pockets for the mirrors and was simply a too short and too narrow and essentially useless product. Seems it is made from paper.
customer_reviews.author: Breffni

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: It's thinner than expected and NOT WATERPROOF. I bought it to keep the rain off my convertible when it's parked outside for long periods of time and need to put a tarp under it. It fits well for a universal fit though, and if you're looking for a dust cover it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carnegie

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE, COVERS LENGTH OF CAR ( BARELY ) BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE, COVERS LENGTH OF CAR ( BARELY ) BUT ONLY HALF WAY DOWN ON THE HEIGHT, LEAVING THE BOTTOM HALF OF THE DOORS EXPOSED , AND WHEELS AND TIRES TOTALLY EXPOSED, SO WHAT IS THE POINT ? I WILL STILL HAVE TO WASH CAR, BOTTOM HALF WILL BE DIRTY......THE PRODUCT RIPPED WHEN TRYING TO MAKE IT FIT,,,,.NEVER BUY AGAIN........VERY LET DOWN BY THIS PRODUCT, THEY SHOULD GIVE A REFUND.
customer_reviews.author: Luke D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is just what I wanted, ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is just what I wanted, an indoor cover, we in southern Utah get a lot of wind and dirt, this just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage for my mid-size sedan & it's pretty easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.author: AvidShopper

customer_reviews.title: Plenty large for my 2017 Mazda 6
customer_reviews.text: Cover a car sitting outside for 3 weeks while on vacation. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits right
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Mercedes-Benz S550 perfect, I recommend 100% Great price that I bought other one just to keep if someone take over and walk way.
customer_reviews.author: Sanguesuga

customer_reviews.title: Just what they say it is
customer_reviews.text: Hey, this is great! I have it over one of my cars this winter. Neighbors probably wish I'd move it. But it fits tight, repels the rain, was easy to put on, fit just as promised, feels good quality. Wasn't very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: NOT WATERPROOF!!! What a was of money. Put this on a month ago and after it rained today, my car is soaked!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Belz

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: it still works perfectly fit to size really good for my Kia
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Almanzar

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but it’s kinda big on my car. Overall it helps.
customer_reviews.author: jmclay

customer_reviews.title: Loved It.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Volkswagen Beetle. Size fits great, It rained allot over the weekend and there was no water what's so ever on the vehicle. I would definitely recommend this product to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: akeem

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cover but more of an infldoor application. Not waterproof unless you get a can of scotch guard.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: The item says it fits big size sedans but didn’t fit my boyfriends g8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 2007 Chevrolet Malibut 4 door LTZ
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2007 Chevrolet Mailibu and this fits great. It only has one grommet on the bottom by the front door to tie across under the car and I wish it had another one by the back door too. I tied a rope around the back of the car which works fine, but one more grommet on the bottom would be nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Norris

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to help prevent water from coming into ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help prevent water from coming into my car since my convertibles rear window has a leak. I put it on and when it rains there is just as much water that came in. Did not serve the purpose I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for vehicle for those without garage. Can't guarantee safe from hail damage however it certainly will help.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Very thin.
customer_reviews.text: It just did not do the job. When I removed it from my car, my car was dirty as dust had gotten through. The fitted corners were holding rain water.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anglin

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: it fits our car like a glove but its not as water proof as you might think. it doesn't completely soak the car but when we take the cover off after it rains there is wet spots on the car. but overall its a good cover.
customer_reviews.author: Davidswife

customer_reviews.title: but other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Use it to keep my 2000 Chrysler Sebring Convertible covered up in the garage from dust. Had to cut me an Antenna hole, but other than that it is a great product. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories 10-010-051001-00 OverDrive PolyPro 1 Full Size Sedan Car Cover,Biodiesel
product_meta.description: Classic Accessories OverDrive Polypro 1 Full Size Car Cover for Sedan is a fabric is water repellent yet breathes to reduce mold and mildew. It protects against dirt, scratches and harmful UV rays, and is perfect for storage and moderate UV weather protection. Fits sedans 191 inch - 210 inch long, for example Lexus LS 470 and Mercedes S Class.
feature_bullets: Corners Have an Elasticized Hem for a Fast, Custom Fit
